channel.title: Make Windows XP Look VERY MUCH Like Windows Vista
channel.description:
You Will Need To Follow These Instructions Very Closely
Step 1: Download This [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/4f4cc3/]UXTheme Multi Patcher[/url] Step 2: Extract the file to your desktop and then run the executable follow its instructions when the windows pops up telling you to insert your cd press cancel like the executable says and then click on in the executable. Step 3: Close this window and reboot your computer like the executable says. Once you are back open this page and continue . Step 4: Installing the cursors: Download the [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/3e96c3/]aero cursor[/url] files to you desktop. Step 5: To install the cursors go to the bottom of the page right click on install and choose install. Step 6: Applying the cursors: Go to control panel > printers and other hardware > mouse > choose pointers at the top > Under Scheme choose aero cursors if a box pops up click yes > click apply > click ok. Step 7: Installing Windows Aero Theme: Download [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/5f7a8d/]this file[/url] and extract it to [code]C:\WINDOWS\Resources\Themes\[/code] Step 8: Go to your desktop > right click on your desktop > click properties > click appearance at the top > under windows and buttons choose windows aero click apply > click ok. Step 9: Your done and your computer should look like this [img]http://i19.tinypic.com/6exxxyu.jpg[/img] [img]http://i8.tinypic.com/5yiqxz5.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@Hippie_Slay wrote:

ok i followed all the instructions but I see a problem…

gotoC:\WINDOWS\Resources\Themes\Windows Aero
ok now look at the actual file Windows Aero…

Why is The file a “Windows Visual Style File” when it should be a Theme file?

Ok for example look at the luna its a .theme file, this is a .msstyles file…

So if you could offer me any help?

item.title: Make Windows XP Look VERY MUCH Like Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

You Will Need To Follow These Instructions Very Closely

Step 1: Download This UXTheme Multi Patcher
Step 2: Extract the file to your desktop and then run the executable follow its instructions when the windows pops up telling you to insert your cd press cancel like the executable says and then click on in the executable.
Step 3: Close this window and reboot your computer like the executable says. Once you are back open this page and continue .
Step 4: Installing the cursors: Download the aero cursor files to you desktop.
Step 5: To install the cursors go to the bottom of the page right click on install and choose install.
Step 6: Applying the cursors: Go to control panel > printers and other hardware > mouse > choose pointers at the top > Under Scheme choose aero cursors if a box pops up click yes > click apply > click ok.
Step 7: Installing Windows Aero Theme: Download this file and extract it to C:\WINDOWS\Resources\Themes\
Step 8: Go to your desktop > right click on your desktop > click properties > click appearance at the top > under windows and buttons choose windows aero click apply > click ok.
Step 9: Your done and your computer should look like this

6exxxyu.jpg1600×1000
